thread.title: Are Israeli-Palestinian troubles spiraling out of control? PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Are Israeli-Palestinian troubles spiraling out of control? | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Are Israeli-Palestinian troubles spiraling out of control? PBS NewsHour
text: Palestinians proclaimed a "day of rage" after nearly a month of escalating violence -- including stabbings, shootings and attacks with cars -- in which at least eight Israelis and 28 Palestinians have been killed. Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu convened an emergency meeting, accusing Palestinian leaders of stoking violence. Special correspondent Martin Seemungal reports from Jerusalem.
